title: Fantastic Executive house in Moraga, 4 bedrooms, 3 baths
posting_body: Fantastic Executive house in Moraga, 4 bedrooms, 3 baths
-The elegant house locates in a prestigious private area with open mountain view and end of cul-de-sac.
Easy access to freeway and Bart station (about 15 minutes)
-Master suite has large walk-in closets and Jacuzzi bath tub
- Kitchen has spacious open space, Granite Counters and Stainless Steel Appliances
- Three beautiful Fireplaces in the house
- Living, dinning and family rooms have beautiful hardwood flooring and vaulted ceilings
- Big Backyard , a wonderful spa, a huge deck with astonishing view
-Gardener and home warranty are paid by owner.
12-Months or longer Lease and Security Deposit (equals one month rent)
